definition[0]: a large group of insects, especially bees, moving together
definition[1]: a crowd of people who are moving quickly
example[0]: Swarms of tourists jostled through the square.
definition[2]: if people swarm somewhere, they go there as a large uncontrolled crowd
example[1]: Photographers were swarming around the princess.
definition[3]: if bees swarm, they leave a hive (=place where they live) in a large group to look for another home
